name: SubNemesis
description:
You take control of a submarine that is stuck in a fish bowl with a large school of aggressive shooting fish. Try to survive the mayhem.

Submission for Bullet Hell Jam 2022 

I worked solo for this game Jam. Leave me some feedback on what can be improved. :)

Used Unity Assets:

Uni Bullet Hell

Ultimate Circular Health Bars Lite

Enemy Vision - Patrol and Line of Sight

Feel 

Thalassophobia: Stylized Oceans

Sci-Fi Arsenal
